name: Abbey Gargoyles
oracle_text: Flying, protection from red
flavor_text:
"Though Serra has not been seen for twenty years, her Gargoyles still watch over our city and punish the guilty."
—Gulsen, Abbey Matron

name: Abbey Matron
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Abbey Matron gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Matrons are kindly souls, but don't ask one for an ale."
—Halina, Dwarven Trader

name: Abbey Matron
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Abbey Matron gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Matrons still say Serra is coming back. I bet she never even existed."
—Murat, Death Speaker

name: Æther Storm
oracle_text: Creature spells can't be cast.
Pay 4 life: Destroy Aether Storm. It can't be regenerated. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text:
"I do love the rain . . . but this storm feels somehow wrong, Taysir."
—Daria

name: Aliban's Tower
oracle_text: Target blocking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Those who hide in hollow towers would do well to remember the rain."
—Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

name: Aliban's Tower
oracle_text: Target blocking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The people of Aysen built their roads with stones from these wonders. Aliban would be pleased with their ingenuity."
—Baki, Wizard Attendant

name: Ambush
oracle_text: Blocking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Don't these goons have anything better to do?"
—Joskun, An-Havva Constable

name: Ambush Party
oracle_text: First strike, haste
flavor_text:
"Call it a cost of doing business. The best way to protect against thieves is to hire better thieves."
—Eron the Relentless

name: Ambush Party
oracle_text: First strike, haste
flavor_text:
"The roads to Koskun Keep are mostly safe these days. Mostly."
—Joskun, An-Havva Constable

name: Anaba Ancestor
oracle_text: {T}: Another target Minotaur creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Ancestors are the wisdom of the tribe and the soul of the Homelands. I am eternally in their debt."
—Taysir

name: Anaba Bodyguard
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"Not someone to pick a fight with, unless you're fond of pain."
—Halina, Dwarven Trader

name: Anaba Bodyguard
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"Not all Minotaurs are tribal. Some are freelance."
—Eron the Relentless

name: Anaba Shaman
oracle_text: {R}, {T}: Anaba Shaman deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text:
"The Shamans? Ha! They are mere craven cows not capable of true magic."
—Irini Sengir

name: Anaba Shaman
oracle_text: {R}, {T}: Anaba Shaman deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text:
"Few master the powers of the earth as well as do the Shamans of the Minotaurs."
—Baki, Wizard Attendant

name: Anaba Spirit Crafter
oracle_text: Minotaur creatures get +1/+0.
flavor_text:
"The Spirit Crafters sing of all our people. They sing of those lost, of those found, and of those who are yet to be."
—Onatah, Anaba Shaman

name: An-Havva Constable
oracle_text: An-Havva Constable's toughness is equal to 1 plus the number of green creatures on the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"Joskun and the other Constables serve with passion, if not with grace."
—Devin, Faerie Noble

name: An-Havva Inn
oracle_text: You gain X plus 1 life, where X is the number of green creatures on the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"The Inn was ever a steady source of good cheer and kindness. Greatly do I miss it, now that I am gone."
—Ihsan's Shade

name: An-Havva Township
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.
flavor_text: Folk of good heart will always find a home.

name: An-Zerrin Ruins
oracle_text: As An-Zerrin Ruins enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures of the chosen type don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
flavor_text:
"The An-Zerrins have served me well, ever since I first killed them."
—Baron Sengir

name: Apocalypse Chime
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Apocalypse Chime: Destroy all nontoken permanents with a name originally printed in the Homelands expansion. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"One day, or another, perhaps I shall ring my pretty chime . . . loudly, so that all may hear."
—Grandmother Sengir

name: Autumn Willow
oracle_text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
{G}: Until end of turn, Autumn Willow can be the target of spells and abilities controlled by target player as though it didn't have shroud.
flavor_text:
"We must shake her limbs and rattle her brains."
—Grandmother Sengir

name: Aysen Abbey
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
flavor_text: Serra's gift to her people: a symbol of faith and hope.

name: Aysen Bureaucrats
oracle_text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 2 or less.
flavor_text:
"I would say that our Bureaucrats are no better than vipers—but I shouldn't insult the vipers."
—Murat, Death Speaker

name: Aysen Bureaucrats
oracle_text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 2 or less.
flavor_text:
"All the tortures of my vault of horrors pale in comparison to dealing with those petty Bureaucrats."
—Baron Sengir

name: Aysen Crusader
oracle_text: Aysen Crusader's power and toughness are each equal to 2 plus the number of Soldiers and Warriors you control.
flavor_text:
"A renegade rallying the rabble does not a true Crusader make."
—Irini Sengir

name: Aysen Highway
oracle_text: White creatures have plainswalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Plains.)
flavor_text:
"Tread the roads of righteousness, Murat, lest you lose your way and be consumed."
—Baris, Serra Inquisitor

name: Baki's Curse
oracle_text: Baki's Curse deals 2 damage to each creature for each Aura attached to that creature.
flavor_text:
"Those who fling spells too quickly should have reason to regret it."
—Baki, Wizard Attendant

name: Baron Sengir
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Baron Sengir this turn dies, put a +2/+2 counter on Baron Sengir.
{T}: Regenerate another target Vampire.
flavor_text: "Beast. Defiler. The source of all my pain." —Ihsan's Shade

name: Beast Walkers
oracle_text: {G}: Beast Walkers gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor_text:
"The Beast Walkers do a great service to Aysen. As humans or as beasts, their heart is yet to Serra true."

oracle_text: Trample
Black Carriage doesn't untap during your untap step.
Sacrifice a creature: Untap Black Carriage. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
flavor_text:
"The Baron's drivers are also driven."

name: Broken Visage
oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact attacking creature. It can't be regenerated. Create a black Spirit creature token. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness. Sacrifice the token at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Carapace
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
Sacrifice Carapace: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor_text:

name: Carapace
oracle_text: Enchant creature

name: Cemetery Gate
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

oracle_text: {R}{R}{R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact creature.

Clockwork Swarm can't be blocked by Walls.

{0}: Dark Maze can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

oracle_text: Protection from black
flavor_text:
"Such innocent little birds. They sing a sweet song, sitting on their fragile branch."

name: Didgeridoo

name: Dry Spell
oracle_text: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

"My soul thirsts for Serra's salvation, as does my body for life's breath."

name: Dry Spell

"Wherever water is lacking, all things suffer."

name: Dwarven Trader
flavor_text:

flavor_text:

oracle_text: Flying

name: Giant Albatross
oracle_text: Flying

When Giant Albatross dies, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, for each creature that dealt damage to Giant Albatross this turn, destroy that creature unless its controller pays 2 life. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

When Giant Oyster leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, remove all -1/-1 counters from the creature.

name: Grandmother Sengir
oracle_text: {1}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Rarely have power and madness been so delightfully wed as they have in our dear Grandmother."

oracle_text: At end of combat, put a -0/-2 counter on each creature blocking or blocked by Greater Werewolf.

name: Hungry Mist

name: Ihsan's Shade

name: Irini Sengir
oracle_text: Green enchantment spells and white enchantment spells cost {2} more to cast.

name: Ironclaw Curse
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -0/-1.
Enchanted creature can't block creatures with power equal to or greater than the enchanted creature's toughness.

name: Joven

flavor_text:

—Baki, Wizard Attendant

name: Rysorian Badger
oracle_text: Whenever Rysorian Badger attacks and isn't blocked, you may exile up to two target creature cards from defending player's graveyard. If you do, you gain 1 life for each card exiled this way and Rysorian Badger assigns no combat damage this turn.

name: Soraya the Falconer
oracle_text: Bird creatures get +1/+1.

{1}{W}: Target Bird creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor_text:
"Soraya speaks with the hunters of the air, as do all of her family line."
